Class AeLinkValidator

  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.AeLinkValidator

IAeValidationDefs
public class AeLinkValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeValidationDefs

Validation helper for link collection and testing.

          Composite link inner class used to manage validation of link definitions.

          Inner class that serves as a flag for the direction of a link
static class AeLinkValidator.AeLinkSource

AeActivityFlowDef

checkLinks

public void checkLinks()
Check for cycles and illegal boundary crosses in the graph's links. Note: this should only be called after the validation visitor has traversed the entire def graph, to ensure that all links and their sources/targets have been resolved. Wherever this hasn't occurred, the composite will be incomplete, which signifies an erroneously defined link.

checkLinkCycles

private void checkLinkCycles()
Check for cycles in the graph's links.

getCrossingError

private java.lang.String getCrossingError(AeBaseDef aParent)
Returns a string array containing the appropriate error text.

Parameters:
aParent - Node type involved in the error. return String

getInnermostUncrossableContainer

private AeBaseDef getInnermostUncrossableContainer(AeBaseDef aDef,
                                                   AeLinkValidator.AeLinkDirection aDirection)
Starting with the def passed, keep walking up its parent defs until we encounter a container that cannot be crossed with a link or until we reach the process root.

Parameters:
aDef -
aDirection - - specifies the direction of the link, either inbound or outbound
Returns:
AeBaseDef - the first uncrossable container encountered or null if none

checkBoundaryCrossings

private void checkBoundaryCrossings(AeLinkValidator.AeLinkComposite aLink)
Verify that a link doesn't cross an uncrossable boundary. Flag an error if so.

Parameters:
aLink - The link to check.
